TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
Got to 600 points and I didn't get a new bar. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I assume it increases to 200 per bar now, right?

8 points to go til my second bar...

EDIT: Yay, thanks a ton guys!

23 rep left.

pls.

> 23 rep left.
> pls.

..Literally 2 points away from my second Light Green Bar.

I'm having an even worse situation.

EDIT: Thanks guys! You're the best.

Rep given.

I now lack 18 points.
Gave you some rep. You seem to be a nice person.

87 points away from my next rep.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-22T10:29:33Z" title="08/22/2015 10:29  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 22, 2015</time> by Alphasus**

6 away from my next rep bar and the Light Green Group!

Quick! Everybody look at this: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132230-Boxkite-Tow-Glider-Tow-Plane-Easy-and-fun-to-fly%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132230-Boxkite-Tow-Glider-Tow-Plane-Easy-and-fun-to-fly%21) it's an excuse to help me out!

8 points, I think.

pls.

Have some kittens, and bonus ducks.

![Cute-Wallpapers-cute-kittens-10501750-1024-768.jpg](http://images2.fanpop.com/image/photos/10500000/Cute-Wallpapers-cute-kittens-10501750-1024-768.jpg)
20 points to go. Only four more reps given, I can do it!!
83 till 400, been away for 13 days, so I haven't earned much recently.

3 points.

Come on. You have the chance to give me a brand new bar.

I rep you back.

> 
> 3 points.
> Come on. You have the chance to give me a brand new bar.
> 
> I rep you back.

> 
> I rep you back.

This is why I wonder why this thread hasn't been locked or deleted yet.

> 
> This is why I wonder why this thread hasn't been locked or deleted yet.

The behavior should certainly be reconciled. The thread wasn't designed for that purpose, **and** it's not in the spirit of the rules.

On topic, I can't get any more rep bars. I think there's another reputation rank but I don't know what the numbers are for it. So, a lot.
Folks, the purpose of these threads is to discuss rep. If you start abusing it to game the forum's rep system, we'll have to shut it down.

I'm 5 away from my second rep bar, which 

I feel is actually a pretty big milestone (for me at least) on the forums. It sets my place within the community even better, and gives a sense of community.
I'm not even sure how the whole reputation thing works... but I guess I'm doing something right, I've got over 70 points in the few weeks I've been here.
Wait, I thought rep was in multiples of 5? I just got 1 point from somebody. (So I'm now 24 away from the next reputation rank, not that anyone can see that)

5 points away = 1 rep away from 4 bars ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Any kind person out there for me ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)?

Update 4 bars!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-05T14:45:29Z" title="09/05/2015 02:45  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 5, 2015</time> by ghostbuzzer7**
107 points for me, just got my 2nd bar so I'm pretty far from the next one ^^

I'm just two points away.

I [wrote a tribute](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122280-Duna-Ore-Bust%21-a-KSP-Graphic-Novel-%28COMPLETE%29?p=2180058&viewfull=1#post2180058) to Duna, Ore Bust! in the form of a song/poem that might be worth some rep for the right reader.

Happy landings!

> 
> Wait, I thought rep was in multiples of 5? I just got 1 point from somebody. (So I'm now 24 away from the next reputation rank, not that anyone can see that)

There's some formula somewhere that works out how much rep a person gives each time they rep you, you get 1-5 points depending on how long they've been on the forum, post count and a bunch of other stuff I think.

Also, I'm 19 points from a bar.
48 rep till 400, have some Voyager/Titan 3E replica eye candy ![WIRFzgR.png](http://i.imgur.com/WIRFzgR.png)![IoSgnBP.png](http://i.imgur.com/IoSgnBP.png)
57 till my last dark green bar.

I don't like doing this, but I've been stuck here for so long.

I am 3 points away from 3 light green bars. To actually give you a possible reason to rep me, here is my fan fiction, starring the orange 4 in their childhood.
